Post-Match Reflections: We feel sorry for our fans, everywhere we go we get such superb support. Through our ups and downs they continue supporting us. I hope they will continue supporting us like this.
The last six months we havenâ€™t played well, but we have been competitive in these last two games. The World Cup will be a different challenge. We need to work on many areas to do well there.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thousands of Bangladesh fans were at the stands, cheering their team. But in both matches they went home disappointed.
